verses.name: 2 Kings 15:5
verses.text: And the Lord smote the king, so that he was a leper unto the day of his death, and dwelt in a several house. And Jotham the king’s son was over the house, judging the people of the land.

verses.name: 2 Kings 15:6
verses.text: And the rest of the acts of Azariah, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

verses.name: 2 Kings 15:7
verses.text: So Azariah slept with his fathers; and they buried him with his fathers in the city of David: and Jotham his son reigned in his stead.
